context.flawed_solution:
#### 160
The sum of his scores across the first 3 subjects is 50+70 = <<50+70=120>>120
The average score over the 3 subjects which is his History score is = total/3 = 120/3 = <<120/3=40>>40
Therefore his score across all 4 subjects = 120+40 = <<120+40=160>>160
